name: NumberInput
description: Number Input to create an input with a formatted number
note: This requires RN67 to work on Android.

props.name: onChangeNumber
props.description: Callback that is called when the number value has changed.

props.name: initialNumber
props.description: A valid number (in en locale, i.e. only digits and a decimal point).

props.name: fractionDigits
props.description: Number of digits after the decimal point. Must be in the range 0 - 20, inclusive.

props.name: leadingTextStyle
props.description: The style of the leading text

props.name: trailingTextStyle
props.description: The style of the trailing text

props.name: containerStyle
props.description: Container style of the whole component

props.name: contextMenuHidden
props.description: If true, context menu is hidden.

props.name: textFieldProps
props.description: Most of TextField's props can be applied, except for ones that are passed directly via named props.
